properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands; East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt. Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island; Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 25 at 4:49AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
Areas of dense fog with visibility one nautical mile or less
continues inside the southern California bight and near the
Channel Islands. The southern coastal waters will likely continue
to experience visibilities from one quarter mile to near zero at
times through mid-morning.

Mariners in harbor, especially those without radar, should
consider remaining in harbor until the dense fog improves.
Poor visibilities can obscure vision of exposed rocks and other
vessels, including large ships in the shipping lanes.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG TO AFFECT SOUTHERN COASTAL WATERS THROUGH MID MORNING TODAY
